price: A can ne kõwane rai yake jarraba abin da ya bãyar bãshi, kuma aka mayar da su zuwa ga Allah, Majiɓincinsu Tabbatacce kuma, abin da suka kasance sunã ƙirƙirãwa ya ɓace musu.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hunālika tablū kullu nafsin mā aslafat waruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
